table.name: vtiger_servicetask
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicetask` ( `servicetaskid` int(11) NOT NULL, `taskname` varchar(100) default NULL, `runmode` varchar(100) default NULL, `runconditiontype` int(1) DEFAULT '0', `relativeday` int(19) DEFAULT '3', `circulationday` int(19) DEFAULT '3', `circulationcount` int(19) DEFAULT '12', `timeconsuming` int(19) DEFAULT '1', `taskcontent` text, `helpinfo` text, `creatorid` int(19) DEFAULT '0', `createdtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `modifiedby` int(19) DEFAULT '0', `modifiedtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `remark` text, PRIMARY KEY (`servicetaskid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
